docs.description: Introduction to the Document Object Model (DOM) and its role in web development.
Comprehensive documentation and guides on HTML, including elements, attributes, and best practices for web development.
An introductory guide explaining the fundamental mechanics of how the Internet operates.

notes.description: Comprehensive tutorials covering fundamental concepts and components of computer networks.
This page provides an introduction to networking concepts and their relevance in cybersecurity.
An introductory guide to the fundamental concepts and components of computer networking.
A comprehensive tutorial covering the essential concepts and principles of computer fundamentals.
An introductory guide to Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) concepts for beginners in computer networking.

quiz.question: Which layer of the OSI Model is responsible for establishing, managing, and terminating connections between applications?
quiz.hint: This layer sits between the transport and presentation layers.

quiz.question: What is the primary function of the TCP/IP Stack's Internet Layer?
quiz.hint: This layer is responsible for determining the best path for data transmission.

quiz.question: Which protocol is used for transferring files between client and server on a network?
quiz.hint: This protocol is specifically designed for file transfer.

quiz.question: In IP addressing, what is the primary role of a subnet mask?
options: Identify the network part of an IP address
Map domain names to IP addresses
quiz.hint: This component helps in distinguishing the network part from the host part of an IP address.

quiz.question: Which of the following is a method to enhance network security?
quiz.hint: This method acts as a barrier to protect a network from unauthorized access.
